com.basho.riak.client.api.convert

Enum ConverterFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ConverterFactory>
      • com.basho.riak.client.api.convert.ConverterFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<ConverterFactory>

    public enum ConverterFactory
extends Enum<ConverterFactory>
    Holds instances of converters to be used for serialization / deserialization of objects stored and fetched from Riak.

    When storing and retrieving your own domain objects to/from Riak, they need to be serialized / deserialized. By default the JSONConverter is provided. This uses the Jackson JSON library to translate your object to/from JSON. In many cases you will never need to create or register your own converter with the ConverterFactory.

    In the case you do need custom conversion, you would extend Converter and then register it with the ConverterFactory for your classes.

    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    Brian Roach

        public <T> Converter<T> getConverter(Type type)
        Returns a Converter instance for the supplied class.

        If no converter is registered, the default JSONConverter is returned.

        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:
